content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 24.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to remove pipe groups
- Ensure the pipe group exists at the specified position before attempting to remove it. Verify the position and check for any changes in the map that may have affected the entity's presence.

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Check for placement blockages before attempting to connect entities. Ensure that there are no other entities obstructing the connection path between the boiler and steam engine.
